name: description
description: Description of the DockerHub repository.

name: description_analyzed
description: Analyzed description of the DockerHub repository.

name: full_description_analyzed
description: Analyzed full description of the DockerHub repository.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Date when the repo was fetched.

name: id
description: Id of the DockerHub repository

name: is_automated
description: True/False if updating repository is automated or not.

name: is_docker_image
description: Field containing '1' only if the item is a docker image.

name: is_dockerhub_dockerhub
description: Field containing '1' only if the item is downloaded from DockerHub.

name: is_event
description: Field containing '1' only if the fetching item is an event.

name: is_private
description: True/False if the repository is private or not.

name: last_updated
description: Date when the changeset was last updated.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: pull_count
description: Number of pulls of the repository.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: repository_type
description: Repository type (image).

name: star_count
description: Number of stars of the repository

name: status
description: DockerHub Build status.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: user
description: DockerHub user.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
